/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with power lines, stretches out into the distance, disappearing into the horizon. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which adds a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
